revised_title: Experimental Researches on the Electric Discharge with the Chloride-of-Silver Battery
tldr: De La Rue and Muller investigate the electric discharge with the chloride-of-silver battery, examining the striking-distance between terminals of different forms in air and other gases. They also study the effects of high-tension currents on inducing secondary currents and magnetism. The research provides insights into the behavior of electrical discharges and their applications.
